abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has bought a small stake in Kraft Foods, according to The Wall Street Journal. Mr. Buffett, with a stake of less than 5 percent, joins activist investors Carl C. Icahn and Nelson Peltz as investors in the food giant, The Journal said.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has bought a small stake in Kraft Foods, according to The Wall Street Journal. Mr. Buffett, with a stake of less than 5 percent, joins activist investors Carl C. Icahn and Nelson Peltz as investors in the food giant, The Journal said.

headline.main: Buffett Said to Take a Slice of Kraft
